newsitem.title: RUSSIA: Chubais also named Russian finance minister.
newsitem.headline: Chubais also named Russian finance minister.

text.p: First Deputy Prime Minister Anatoly Chubais, a reformer, will also be finance minister in the new Russian government, Prime Minister Viktor Chernomyrdin said on Monday.
Chubais, shifted to the government from the post of head of the Kremlin administration on March 7, is expected to take overall charge of economic reforms.
As finance minister he replaces Alexander Livshits, also a reformer.
Chubais was one of an initial group of ministers named by Chernomyrdin under a reshuffle ordered by President Boris Yeltsin.
Livshits told Interfax news agency that he will become President Boris Yeltsin's deputy chief of staff.
